abstracts.cdata!:
The Eligibility Report for
            Paraguay's SEGBA V Power Distribution Project describes
            the project and Request for Inspection. The Request was
            submitted by Federacion de Afectados por Yacyreta de Itapua
            y Misiones (FEDAYIM), a local nongovernmental organization
            on its behalf as well as of more than 4,000 families who
            believe their lives are being affected socially and
            environmentally, because of the impacts of the Yacyreta
            Hydroelectric Dam. According to the Request, these families
            were not appropriately identified and "quantified in
            their real dimensions" as a consequence, thousands of
            them were excluded from existing compensation and mitigation
            programs in spite of the fact that they have owned and
            occupied lands affected by the construction of the dam for
            more than 20 years. The Eligibility Report examines the
            Request and the Management's Response and finds that
            the Requesters have a righteous claim that the Bank is in
            violation of its policies and procedures.  The Panel
            concludes that the eligibility requirements for an
            Investigation have been met.
